actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The gnoll has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the gnolls allies is within 5 feet of the creature and not incapacitated.
